Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Piscis - Adults Only, you'll be centrally located in Alcudia, walking distance from Alcudia Port and close to San Jaume Church. This family-friendly resort is within the vicinity of Albufera Natural Park and Pollensa Port.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 206 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This resort also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this resort. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Piscis - Adults Only. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, a computer station, and a 24-hour front desk.


Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this resort. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Piscis - Adults Only. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Hotel Piscis - Adults Only, you'll be centrally located in Alcudia, walking distance from Alcudia Port and close to San Jaume Church. This family-friendly resort is within the vicinity of Albufera Natural Park and Pollensa Port.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Alcudia Port - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
San Jaume Church - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Albufera Natural Park - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Pollensa Port - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi
Cala Barques - 11 km / 6.8 mi
Formentor Cape Lighthouse - 14.7 km / 9.2 mi
Campanet Caves - 15.2 km / 9.5 mi
Ufanes Fonts - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Lluc Monastery - 21.4 km / 13.3 mi
Cala Agulla Beach - 30.3 km / 18.8 mi
Castillo de Alaro - 31.6 km / 19.7 mi
Puig Mayor - 34.4 km / 21.4 mi
Cala Millor Beach - 34.8 km / 21.6 mi
Can Prunera Museum of Modernism - 36.5 km / 22.7 mi
Punta de N'Amer Watch Tower - 36.8 km / 22.9 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Piscis - Adults Only is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 47.6 km / 29.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
